overview: As per a recent report, thousands of girls from Kerala and Mangalore from Hindu and Christian communities have been converted to Islam, most of them ending in Syria, Afghanistan and other ISIS and Taliban influenced areas. Brutal harassment and tortures lead to the death of Sarath in police custody. Custody murders have been the heading of our newspapers since a long time. Yamin and his struggles with loneliness and isolation. His little brother, Dhamin, helps him to find some solace through their shared love of drawing. However, Yamin still feels the need to leave and find his own way in the end. It's a touching story about the power of connection and creativity.

Searching for memories and associations, he wanders through the abandoned city, trying to connect with the imagery and thought of his ancestors and looking inside his own perception, reflecting on the traces of inspiration and the spirit of the places he explores.
title: Dinosaur's Egg

overview: Oshana takes you through the journey through the life of a guy named John, where you see how the people around him and his love stories shape everything. Each romance brings unexpected twists and turns, making it a real rollercoaster ride. It's a film that captures all the drama and excitement of love and life in a way that'll keep you hooked.
title: Oshana

overview: This film delves into the ordinary existence of a dhobi community who were enslaved by the Dutch during the Colonial Era. Told through the journeys of four central characters, the film paints a vivid portrait of their remarkable stories, depicting both their trials and triumphs, as well as their unwavering spirit of resistance and endurance.
title: Slaves of the Empire

overview: In North Malabar, Mukundan, a local Communist Party secretary as well as a Theyyam artist, grapples with the challenges of ageing and life’s complexities. Yet, he is determined to perform for the upcoming Gulikan Theyyam, marking the onset of the year’s festivities after the tenth day of Thulam, which could probably be his last.
title: Fall

overview: How many servers would you hack for love? What started as a silly attempt to win back his girlfriend turns into a dangerous game of revenge for Vishnu, risking everything he cherishes.
title: I Am Kathalan

overview: Shanawas, a flirtatious taxi driver in Fort Kochi, faces a life-changing moment when his mother, Jamila, arrives unexpectedly.
title: Jameelante Poovan Kozhi

overview: In the bustling city, two families live parallel lives, separated by wealth and social status. As the two families navigate their lives, they face challenges and triumphs:
title: Swargam

overview: In Kerala, an investigating journalist disappears without notice. Media and public stunned. Investigation uncovers shocking, unexpected mysteries. Suspenseful plot follows the case's twists and revelations.
title: Oru Anweshanathinte Thudakkam

overview: In Trivandrum, four inseperable friends, from raw, rustic background Anandhu, Saji, Manu, and Manaf plan the ultimate heist, their one shot at turning dreams into reality. But as they dive deeper, shadows from the past surface, unraveling hidden motives and testing loyalties in ways they never saw coming. When friendship clashes with ambition, how far will they go for revenge?
title: Mura

overview: Follows the missing person case of Merin Joy and how an ordinary man with a tragic past gets wrapped in the investigation.
title: Anand Sreebala

overview: A man who performed the religious rituals for a village from which he was driven out is asked to return and revive the place's fortunes.
title: Deshakkaran

overview: Boney, a carefree man finds his life turned upside down after marriage when hes forced to deal with the restless spirit of his obsessive-compulsive mother-in-law.
title: Hello Mummy

overview: The short brief filmed about a man who really worries about his life and his future.
title: Social Animal

overview: A grisly mishap occurs, and the whole village takes two sides in utmost horror, fighting it with belief systems. With time running out, a determined police officer bravely steps in to save the day.
title: Turkish Tharkkam

overview: A young man's plans to get revenge on a rival are complicated by romance and tragedy in this Malayalam-language drama.
title: Parakramam

overview: Joekuttan, a taxi driver, arrives at a lodge seeking female companionship. There, he witnesses a crime. When he goes to the police station to give his testimony, he faces a series of unexpected events, which entangle him in even more serious problems.
title: Njan Kandatha Sare

overview: Manuel returns with his mother to their former home in a middle-class neighbourhood. Suspicious of his intentions, Priyadarshini and her friends begin gathering clues, convinced he may be hiding something sinister.
title: Sookshmadarshini

overview: ‘Her’ features five strong, unrestrained female characters, in a hyperlink narrative that celebrates womanhood in all its myriad forms. The story represents today’s women from varied backgrounds coming out of their comfort zones to live life to the fullest.
title: Her

overview: First chapter in the chronicles of a 231-year-old vampire in his journey with his fellow vampires.
title: Agolathapanavum Athmahathyayum - Chapter 1: Aipose Puranam

overview: In a remote resort, newlyweds Apsara and her husband, Laalu, face a dangerous bet with the wealthy moneylender, Madhavan, who seeks to claim Apsara. Over the course of seven days, Madhavan attempts to seduce her through discussions of an ancient book on lust. Meanwhile, Apsara, determined to remain faithful, battles his advances. The outcome of the bet hinges on her ability to resist his manipulation and maintain her resolve.
title: Saptha Kandam

overview: Life gifted everything to Jeevan, a successful IT professional, love, friendship, luxuries...anything one could ask for.. But fate had a different plan for him.
title: Jeevan

overview: Swathi, who was once a free and progressive young woman, is now captivated by an unknown man. She needs to find the reason why she was captured and escape this trap from a masked man who has no limits when it comes to torture.
title: Rudhiram

overview: “The Looking Glass” is a reflective journey through the eyes of Kaladharan, an aging filmmaker confronting his past. As he grapples with the consequences of altering his characters’ fates, particularly Sreeram’s, the film questions the nature of art and love.
title: The Looking Glass

overview: Roshini reconnects with her estranged half-brother Nived after their mother's death. While Nived remembers a loving, present mother, Roshini struggles with memories of abandonment and alcoholism. As they confront their contrasting perceptions, Roshini seeks closure for the pain of a mother she barely knew. Through heartfelt conversations and a symbolic attempt to connect with their mother, the film explores grief, family, and the search for healing.
title: In Search of the Light

overview: Hari, a government employee, lives with his wife Sujata, their son Sankaran, and his brother Murali. When Hari's colleague Reji and his family visit for two days, the families celebrate, despite Murali being tired from work. The next day, Hari and Reji attend a wedding with their wives, leaving the children—Helen, Maria, and Sankaran—at home. Maria invites Sankaran to play a game, but as they play, the mood and intensity of the game shift dramatically.

overview: A teenage girl, caught between the love for her mother and the fear of losing her, battles inner turmoil and societal taboos as she strives to honour a promise, confronting the harsh realities of gender discrimination and deeply rooted superstitions. As she treads through this intricate maze, she discovers the limitations of her youth, often realising the helplessness of being a young girl in a world where adults make all decisions. Set against the backdrop of contemporary India, where gender discrimination is normalised, the film sheds light on the persistence of superstitions in society. The movie explores the profound bond between a mother and daughter and the lengths to which a young girl could go to fulfil a promise made to her mother.
title: The Other Side

overview: Set in Kochi right before the pandemic, micro-celebrity and boy genius Gabriel finds himself in the midst of an ugly rumor as he deals with small people with big city ideas.
title: Watusi Zombie!

overview: Two best friends go on a road trip to Gokarna a place renowned for beautiful landscapes offering promises of a much-needed calm. The serene atmosphere is gradually jostled into unfolding a series of mysteries.
title: Far

overview: Five female transgender friends in Kerala, Rosa, Janaki, Nandhana, Uma, and Benila, with different sexual orientations, upholds their identities, assert ownership of bodies, challenge societal, familial restrictions and expectations.
title: Girl Friends

overview: Devan is a hypersexual young man whom his friends call "Kamadeva." He considers himself a macho man and asserts his machismo in every possible situation. A total womanizer who thinks of women as means of quenching his sexual thirst. One day he brings a young lady to his house who in turn makes hid night "unforgettable".
title: Cupid Saw the Star

overview: Unni, a struggling film editor in Kerala, is editing a travel vlog. It shows members of a Kenyan tribe singing a traditional song. Unni’s grandmother overhears the song, starts singing along, and claims to know the song. Intrigued, Unni and his girlfriend Anupama share his grandmother’s song on social media. Realising from the comments that many people know the song, they set out to make a documentary about its origin. They travel across Kerala and interview people from various walks of life claiming to know the song. With each new person they meet, the mystery surrounding the song deepens.
title: Pattth

overview: Maayunnu, Maarivarayunnu, Nisvaasangalil... or "Dust Art Redrawn in Respiration" is about s documentary crew arriving to document the life of two couples. In their conversations the couples tries to trivilize the man's 'concerns' and express their views on social life, individual freedom, borderlines in relations, power in relations etc. among other things. As the interaction progresses, a controlling voice, and then a commanding presence which determine how they should be presented and heard are revealed.
title: Dust Art Redrawn in Respiration

overview: Britto, a skinny young man striving to get fit, relies on eggs for his protein boost. But when his eggs mysteriously start disappearing, suspicions rise among his four housemates. As frustration builds, Britto is determined to catch the culprit behind the missing eggs.
title: Mutta Kallan

overview: “Pinvathil (Back Door),” directed by J C George, is an unconventional take on everyday socio-political life. Set in a small village, the movie uses absurdity and surrealism to critique the concept of world democracy.
title: Back Door

overview: A group of students aged between 18 to 25 shares their opinion on the first thing they want to change in their country if they get the power to do so.

overview: A historic rifle club in the Western Ghats becomes the center of a thrilling fight for survival when a dangerous arms dealer and his gang come seeking revenge. The club’s members, skilled hunters with a shared passion, work together to protect their lives and their legacy.
title: Rifle Club

overview: A controlling son's family try to prevent him from regaining his memory after he is hospitalised following a blow to the head.
title: ED: Extra Decent

overview: The adoptive son of the Adattu family, Marco, sets off on a ruthless quest for vengeance after his brother is brutally murdered, finding only betrayal, loss and unimaginable brutality at every step.

Set against the quiet rhythms of their everyday life, the film beautifully captures moments of love, nostalgia, and the unspoken connection that binds them together.
title: Golden Love

overview: Barroz has been protecting D' Gama's treasure for 400 years and has been entrusted to hand over the treasure to a true descendant of D' Gama. One day, a boy comes in search of Barroz, claiming that he is a descendant of Vasco da Gama. Barroz sets on a journey to find out the boy's true ancestors and history.
title: Barroz: Guardian of Treasures

overview: A Lonely Teenager decides to take a psychological challenge which may lead to the dark past which he is unaware of.

overview: Captured during the early days of production, this unreleased film offers a glimpse into its rehearsal sessions — an intimate icebreaking moment where the cast come together through song and rhythmic clapping.
title: Syllable on the ending

overview: A sketch artist and a cop work together to unravel the identity of an elusive killer using the descriptions of his face, etched into the memory of an eye-witness to the brutal crime
title: Identity

overview: The Malabar Tales is an anthology of five gripping family dramas set in Kerala, exploring themes of identity, heartbreak, second chances, tough choices, and social issues across diverse backdrops, from simple homes to affluent mansions.
title: The Malabar Tales

overview: Mizhimol, an orphaned girl, finds solace with her uncle Pappan, while Kelu, a reclusive craftsman, secretly resents him. An unexpected event shakes the village, unraveling a gripping tale of suspense, sacrifice, and justice.

overview: An exploration of a small rural community and the effects that COVID-19 restrictions have on their daily lives.

overview: Vinod's peaceful life is shattered when a morphed, compromising photo of his wife goes viral, forcing him to embark on a desperate mission to uncover and confront the culprit behind the malicious act.

overview: A teenager feeling loneliness
title: Look at the Sky

overview: Thomas, a reluctant priest is forced into ordination to fulfill his mother's vow. His peaceful existence at the church mansion is disrupted when a young woman, seeking refuge from her troubles, unexpectedly arrives. To complicate matters, a mischievous thief sneaks into the same room, setting the stage for a series of chaotic and humorous encounters. As the unlikely trio navigates misunderstandings and dilemmas, they uncover heartfelt connections and unexpected revelations in this entertaining tale of faith, humanity, and redemption.
title: Ennu Swantham Punyalan

overview: A son struggles to cope with his father’s endless search for his  missing wife, but a visit to a significant place from their past  reveals heartbreaking truths that could change everything.
title: Ariyathe - The Unknowns

overview: On a rainy night, a toddy shop owner is found hanging after 11 people stayed inside playing cards in the closed shop. SI Santhosh investigates, uncovering secrets to find the killer.
title: Pravinkoodu Shappu

original_title: 1098 Ten, Nine, Eight: A Countdown to Infinity
overview: Childline receives a distressing complaint about a +2 student, who is of mixed Bengali and Malayali Dalit heritage, being expelled from a government school in a rural village without any apparent reason. Upon investigating, the Childline team exposes a web of social, political, and racial secrets, revealing that institutions and individuals meant to be role models are culpable. As the team digs deeper, they uncover the shocking truth behind the student's expulsion, leaving them stunned and disturbed.
title: 1098 Ten, Nine, Eight: A Countdown to Infinity

overview: Father Jomon, a church priest, becomes entangled in controversy after a woman`s tragic suicide and defamatory claims against him surface online. As slander spreads, his friends uncover a deeper conspiracy, embarking on a quest to reveal the truth.

overview: An insurance claim adjuster's life turns upside down when god pays him a visit
title: OH GOD !

overview: Armed with high hopes and small wallets, three youngsters set out to make their dream film. But when an actor with a flair for drama joins the team, their journey quickly spirals into mayhem.

overview: Revolves around a couple who are divorced due to misunderstandings and a friend who comes to assist them
title: Besty

overview: A newlywed couple faces the amusing challenges of balancing their modern lifestyle with traditional family expectations in Kerala, leading to a series of heartwarming and comedic situations.

'Blue hair' delves in to the vlogs from 4 young men, whose humor rooted in insensitive comments on caste, color and class leads to unsettling events.

overview: ‘Bumblinga’, a modern matchmaking tale, is a coming of age romantic comedy short film that revolves around two youngsters in Kochi, Prahaladhan and Bhagya, and how they connect with each other through a dating app.

overview: Jiju Janardhanan is in love with Sandhya, she belongs to an old traditional family. Their annual pooja ritual along with Jiju and Sandhya's love and her intention to elope from home seems to be do or die situation. The large family is against their love and that complication leads to more interesting things to follow.

overview: When a girl, supposedly an expert in palmistry, requests Jayesh to display his hand, he eagerly obliges. But when she tells him that this will be the worst time of his life, it surprises him.

overview: A wealthy executive and a struggling artist encounter a mysterious drifter whose presence forces them to face buried truths and reshape their lives.

overview: A short documentary on a grandson returning home to visit his aging grandmother who was crying to see him on the phone.
title: Those, revealed on the walls, in a touch

overview: A young man's body is overtaken by an undefined itching fever, leading his parents to seek healing.
title: Usual Fevers

overview: Two radical villagers try to overthrow a fascist government one brick at a time.
title: BunnyBoo Live

overview: A celebrity bodyguard finds himself in trouble when he crosses an infamous boxer.

overview: Tale of Suku, who fakes insanity to escape the law. While faking insanity, he falls in love.
title: Painkili

overview: Binto teams up with his brother's friends for a thrilling adventure to find him, leading to unexpected twists, discoveries, and unforgettable moments.

overview: As Samay nears his thirtieth birthday, he and his girlfriend Meenakshi embark on a road trip to a tranquil hill spot on a Saturday afternoon. Between winding roads and quiet moments, their conversations unravel reflections on life’s twists and turns—career choices, societal expectations, relationships, and the delicate balance between personal aspirations and external pressures. A journey filled with warmth, scenic beauty, and unfiltered thoughts, Tree Roots Through Concrete captures the essence of love, change, and the pursuit of meaning.

overview: A demoted police inspector investigates a counterfeit jewelry racket, becoming entangled in a dangerous web of crime that puts his life at stake.

United by their painful pasts, they embark on an adventures journey through the wilderness. Their path becomes one of survival, strength, and hard-fought redemption, where the forest becomes a battleground for both their inner and outer struggles.

overview: A migrant counselor's life takes an unexpected turn when she joins four unusual patients on a transformative journey through Kerala, blending elements of adventure and social commentary.

overview: A male gynecologist, once the sole man in his college class, works in a female-dominated field. He develops feelings for someone who initially dislikes him but slowly warms up, while facing career challenges.

overview: A couple experience marital difficulties after she donates her kidney to him.

overview: Christy invites his old friends to his bachelor party, where Binoy and Sajeer plan a surprise to make the night unforgettable. His presence no longer carries the authority it once did, leaving him frustrated and struggling to find his place in the household.
title: Kalavu

overview: An unexpected family issue sparks tensions between a father and his sons, compelling them to collectively seek a resolution.

overview: A security guard's mundane life transforms when unexpected events affect his family, leading him through a series of incidents that challenge his perspectives on society.

overview: Set in suburban Trivandrum, Kerala, Uttavar unveils a gripping narrative inspired by true events that challenge societal norms. Padma, from an esteemed Nair family, defies convention through her forbidden love for Chanthu, a tribal man.

overview: Five years after becoming Chief Minister of Kerala, Jathin Ramdas' move to align with communal forces led by Balraj 'Baba' Bajrangi, triggers Stephen Nedumpally aka Khureshi Ab'raam to return with his Man Friday Zayed Masood to save his home state and settle scores.

overview: Two childhood friends, separated by time and unspoken feelings, reunite in their hometown. Abhilash sees a second chance with Sherin but as they reconnect, the weight of the past threatens to overshadow their present.

overview: An unlikely group of people become trapped on a bus with a man they do not realise is the serial killer terrorising their community.

overview: A group of youngsters, after failing their plus two exams, aims to join a common college through the sports quota. They choose boxing as their sport. By luck, they manage to survive the district-level competitions. But what will happen at the higher levels?

overview: A cop and a businessman team up on a mission to capture a serial killer, using a series of elaborate games to track him down.

overview: A young man’s journey home after heartbreak takes an unexpected turn, forcing him to face his problems instead of running from them

overview: In the early 1980s in a government office somewhere in Kerala (southern India), a brand-new typewriter loses its heart to Daisy, the young typist of that office.
title: Kovarty

original_title: നെല്ലി മരൂം, ആ മാവും, പേര മരൂം...
overview: Set against the vibrant backdrop of Kerala's legendary School Kalolsavam, this film is a heartfelt exploration of memory, identity, and tradition.
title: Gooseberries, Mangoes, and the Guava...

original_title: Red Balloon and a Peacock's Feather
overview: On his daughter’s birthday, Das chooses not to return home. Instead, he visits Yakob—an elderly man slowly losing his memory. Introducing himself as Yakob’s long-lost son, Yusuf, Das spends the day with him, carefully nurturing conversations and reliving borrowed memories. As they walk, talk, and share quiet moments, a fragile bond begins to form—tender, unexpected, and deeply human.
title: Red Balloon and a Peacock's Feather

overview: A young guy begins to find mysterious scars on his face each morning, triggering a psychological unraveling that forces him to confront a buried truth about his haunting past.

overview: A taxi driver finds himself embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy after his car is confiscated by a corrupt police officer.

overview: Manoj, the son of retired lineman Balan Pillai, and the girls from three different religious sects who enter his life are the subjects of Himuchri. Manoj learns about this worldly existence, impermanence, the necessity of preserving the soul's purity forever, and the fact that all living things are a part of Brahman from the words of Swamiji, who stands in between.
title: Himuchri

overview: The typical love letter to cinema.

overview: Set in the picturesque village of Tiruvala, 'Pathu Maasam' tells the story of the survival of a basic caste laborer named Praseetha. She throws her husband Raghu out of the house under special circumstances and realizes that she is pregnant one of the next few days. This leaves Praseetha conflicted but she does not give up. Raghu, on the other hand, leads a more chaotic life.

overview: In a distant land, Balu and Stephy struggle to balance work, parenting their spirited son with ADHD, and holding their relationship together. When a worn-out stranger enters their lives, a fleeting connection sparks unexpected change in just one day.

overview: Four nerdy comic book enthusiasts find themselves in an unexpected adventure when their school's charming new professor turns their academic world upside down with supernatural events.

As hearts meet near the Hanging Bridge and the London Bridge, fate weaves an unexpected connection between the past and present, revealing that love, no matter the era, always finds a way across time.

overview: A young man develops an unexpected friendship with a talking housefly.

overview: A police officer uncovers a conspiracy based around state-sanctioned violence against victimized villagers.

overview: In a quiet village surrounded by mist covered hills and ancient legends, Abhiram Radhakrishnan plays Arjun, a young documentary filmmaker who arrives searching for truth behind a mysterious ritual performed only at midnight.

overview: An elaborate plan is made to break a pregnant woman out of prison.

overview: In the village of Plaachikkaavu, a local detective, Ujjwalan, must outsmart a mysterious figure in a deadly battle of wits, where his skills are put to the ultimate test.

original_title: ഒന്സ് ഉപോണ് എ ടൈം തെരെ വാസ് എ കള്ളൻ
overview: Neelankavil Joseph Kurien is a rich, lonely old man who lives by himself in a big house. One day, a thief breaks in, but ends up getting stuck. The old man befriends the thief, and his presence brings comfort to the old man's isolated life.

overview: It's the year 1987. Youngsters living in the outskirts of Thiruvananthapuram start exploring breakdancing.

overview: Mary, an Indian nurse in Switzerland, receives an invitation to a Christmas party from a doctor, where she meets Edi. As she navigates the budding feelings, Mary grapples with the looming specter of an arranged marriage awaiting her back home.

overview: Thug CR 143/24 is a gripping Malayalam investigation thriller that unfolds over two high-stakes days. A murder case spirals into a web of shifting narratives, where every character-investigators, suspects, and shadowy figures-adds a new twist to the truth. With no clear hero, the film blurs the lines between guilt and innocence, leaving one haunting question: Who is the real thug?

overview: It follows the story of Nancy Rani, a girl with big dreams, one of which is becoming a movie star, but when she has the opportunity to become an actress, she experiences a big tragedy.

overview: A sudden death of DYSP leads to suicide at first sight and then it turns suspicious murder. Was the DYSP's death a sucide or a murder? The investigation officer Lal MOhan IPS gets into action that leads to more mystery.
title: Police  Day

overview: Tony, a hardworking Kerala student, rejects his father's wish for him to study abroad. His choice strains their relationship and sparks a youth movement across the state.
title: United Kingdom of Kerala

overview: When two girls cross paths with their former classmate's murderer, camp director Bobby tries to keep them safe. However, things take a turn as a series of unsettling events begins to unravel.
title: Koodal

overview: A nostalgic short documentary capturing heartfelt memories of people recalling their very first experience watching a film in a theatre. Each voice shares a personal story of wonder, excitement, and the timeless magic of cinema.
title: Once Upon a Silver Screen

overview: A man arrives on an island to escape a troubled past and battles a vengeful antagonist who follows him there.
title: Jangar

overview: When news of Eldhose's death, a man once adored by the locals, reaches his village, his uncles embark on a chaotic trip in an ambulance to bring his body back home.
title: Dheeran

overview: The life of a Theyyam exponent and his grandson, who is the child of an inter-caste marriage, is topsy-turvy due to caste hierarchy and prejudices. Devanandan, the grandson who is very much passionate about Theyyam, is not allowed to perform the art by the diehard followers of caste systems. So Devanandan leaves the scene wearing the attires and makeup of Theyyam.
title: Moppala

overview: Dear Neil is malayalam short film showing the arch of socially anxious boy to socially confident boy with help of his new friends
title: Dear Neil

overview: The Story revolves around Christo Xavier, a circle inspector, who mentors 11th-class students in his spare time and turns his station into a community place to benefit the kids of the town. As his regular work and tutoring go on, one day he finds a suspicious electronic device from a student’s fair exhibit model.
title: Soothravakyam

overview: A robber's attempt to steal from a dead man's house goes wrong. Trapped in funeral activities, he learns surprising things about people and life while trying to get away.
title: Kolahalam

overview: When two brothers attempt to honour their father's dying wish, their actions cause widespread chaos.
title: Apoorva Puthranmar

overview: Haunted by the weight of his failures and standing on the edge of ending it all, Sanju — a broken young man — unexpectedly crosses paths with an old college acquaintance. What follows is a heartfelt conversation that becomes the turning point in his life.
title: Limbo in The Box

overview: Janaki, an IT professional from Bangalore, returns to her hometown in Kerala for a quiet vacation. But her peace is shattered when she becomes the victim of a horrific incident. As she begins her fight for justice, the case takes an unexpected turn with the entry of Advocate David Abel Donovan.
title: JSK - Janaki V vs State of Kerala

overview: Jagala is a story of a young Muslim man named Chekku who lived in Eranad during the Mappila Rebellion era of 1920s.
title: Jagala

overview: Ratheesh develops strong romantic feelings for his neighbour, Jumaila, but she ends up rejecting him. Things take a turn when Jumaila's sexuality is uncovered.
title: Sea of Love

overview: The Arrogant District Judge Venkitesh Balaji and his naive Personal Security Officer Jyothi Kuttan are abducted and held hostage by a Maoist Group demanding release of their leader in prison. As both men face the impending death, their hierarchy equations change and it becomes a fight for survival.
title: Flask

overview: The life of a weather officer harbouring an obsession with certainty gets complicated when a bizarre incident concerning a neighbour incites his suspicions about his own wife.
title: Raveendra Nee Evide?

overview: Ronaldo aspires to become a filmmaker and win over the love of his life, so when he hears of a filmmaking contest, he prepares to finally achieve his dreams.
title: Oru Ronaldo Chithram

overview: Surabhila Sundara Swapnam features the story of a common man leading a life with his wife and friends in a quaint town. With a dream that he needs to fulfill, the man sets out on a journey, owning a land under his name.  How he manages to achieve his dream and what challenges he faces to get there form the entire story.
title: Surabhila Sundara Swapnam

overview: Police Officer Shiva and his family move into a rented house where they encounter a sewing machine with supernatural powers.
title: Thayyal Machine

overview: When an old man and a teenager from different walks of life are brought together by chance, they form an unlikely connection that transforms them both in unexpected ways.
title: Private

overview: A haunted curve in 1990s Kerala, named after Sumathis tragic death, draws various people into supernatural encounters. As they experience strange events, the mystery of Sumathi and the roads dark history begins to unfold.
title: Sumathi Valavu

overview: A forest guard, Midhun, invites his old friends to a reunion in the woods. What starts as a warm get-together slowly turns into a night of tension, betrayal, and survival, as secrets unravel and friendships crack under pressure.
title: Meesha

overview: Based on the life of Mullassery Raju, the story unfolds over a single night of music, exploring love, relationships, and the resilience of a man who hides his pain to bring joy and unity to those around him.
title: Mehfil

overview: Kodamazha Suni, a retired organised crime leader, is compelled to return to his homeland after his former gang is attacked by an unknown adversary. Haunted by his past decisions, Suni's journey mirrors the battles of ancient warriors, as he faces his greatest adversary yet. As the conflict deepens, Suni’s thought process is explored through the wisdom of an ancient Chinese text, revealing the timeless struggle between strategy, surveillance, and survival
title: Sangarsha Ghadana - The Art of Warfare

overview: A man betrays his partner and disappears with money stolen from a cartel. Later, when the loot is invested in cryptocurrency, it becomes inaccessible due to a lost password.
title: Sahasam

overview: CI Christy Sam goes to Tamil Nadu as part of capturing some interstate criminals, and at the end of that mission, he happens to find out the fact that his long-lost twin brother, Aju from the orphanage, had died under suspicious circumstances. Christy starts investigation to find out his brother's killer.
title: The Case Diary

overview: Mocked for his vitiligo, Jyothish has spent years hiding from the world-until love and a daring dream to act pull him into the light. But when rejection and cruelty test him, he discovers that real victory isn't fame or approval, but the courage to stand up, unbroken, and redefine what makes him extraordinary.
title: Thalavara

overview: Convinced he’s dying, a hypochondriac is pulled into life by a free-spirited woman who shows him that the true danger is learning how to live.
title: Symptoms of Love

overview: "Samalraajinte Swapnangal" is a Malayalam short film directed by Ajmal Akbar, produced by Bunny Cinema Productions
title: Samalraajinte Swapnangal

overview: "Ricard Dance," once a beloved South Indian art form, now struggles to survive. Once as popular as movie stars, artists like Kochu, Santhosh, Kamaru, and many others spent decades traveling across Kerala with the Sree Durga Ricard Dance Group, bringing thousands of characters to life on stage and captivating audiences. Today, their fame has faded, and they face the painful reality that the stage may soon fall silent. Yet, even amid the dominance of modern media, this glimpse into their journey reveals how the art form still finds love and resilience, cherished by those who remember its power.
title: Ricard Dance

overview: A mother, a dancer, and a rebel at heart, Diya lives under the weight of a matriarchal and orthodox household. In a quiet act of defiance, she secretly sneaks out to rediscover the art of dance, igniting a chain of challenges that threaten to unravel her world. As family tensions rise and secrets come to light, Diya must confront her passion, fears, and the true meaning of individuality, proving that resilience can rewrite even the strictest expectations.
title: TWERK

overview: Sandeep, a middle-aged bachelor who recently got a heart transplant, travels to Pune to attend the engagement of his heart-donor’s daughter, Haritha. Her engagement gets broken and Sandeep injures his back on the same day, forcing him to stay back in Pune for a few weeks, in his heart-donor’s house – who was an adventurous Colonel.
title: Hridayapoorvam

overview: The story follows Chandra , a mysterious, goth-influenced woman who has just moved to Bangalore and begins working night shifts at a café. Across the road from her apartment live Sunny and Venu, two aimless bachelors. Sunny becomes infatuated with Chandra, observing her odd routines, strange visitors, and reclusive nature. Their dynamic changes when Sunny gets a glimpse of Chandra in her act.
title: Lokah Chapter 1: Chandra

overview: Jilted at his wedding, Aby encounters a reserved woman needing help. As they heal together, his ex returns with newfound insight into his dreams. A hidden truth leads Aby to find peace.
title: Odum Kuthira Chadum Kuthira

overview: Searching for Nidhi in Madurai's streets, Aryan faces mounting danger and tension at every turn. Time runs short as he navigates growing chaos to stay alive.
title: Maine Pyar Kiya

overview: "Err is Human" is a family drama set in the Netherlands, where an au pair returns after many years to reveal what really happened on a life-altering day decades ago. The film weaves themes of cultural nuances, human values, and how choices made in a fleeting moment can quietly shape the course of their lives.
title: Err is Human

overview: Following their wedding, Purushu struggles to take an antique-style bangle off Sarla's wrist, as it leads to significant conflict and misunderstanding.
title: Vala: Story of a Bangle

overview: Odiyangam traces the origin of the very first Odiyan—a figure woven into Kerala’s folklore—interweaving romance and vengeance with an immersive audiovisual experience .
title: Odiyangam

overview: A woman joins forces with a journalist to investigate secrets her fiancé was keeping from her after she is informed he has died in a tragic train accident.
title: Mirage

overview: Portrays a couple form Kerala who lost their house during harsh winter days while trying settle down in Delhi, building a bond amid challenges in a strange city.
title: If on a Winter's Night

overview: Sundar is on a quest to solve the puzzle of his father's life. His search leads him to his father's filmmaking dreams and a secret half-sister whose mother was the lead actress in B-grade films.
title: Lights, Camera, Achhan

overview: Passingness is a haunting exploration of identity, memory, and the fragile edge of reality. As the narrative unfolds through emotionally charged performances and a tense, introspective atmosphere, the audience is drawn into a fragile space between being and disappearing. A haunting meditation on identity, loneliness, and the terror of not being seen. Driven by intense, intimate performances, the story unfolds in layers of psychological tension, revealing inner scars, blurred truths, and the quiet terror of not knowing who you are or if you ever were.
title: Passingness

original_title: Once upon a time in Trivandrum
overview: At first, it looks like just another ordinary day in Trivandrum. But as the day goes on, five very different stories start to unfold — each with its own unique characters and funny situations.What makes it more interesting is that all these stories, though separate, are secretly connected by one strange and mysterious painting.
title: Once upon a time in Trivandrum

overview: Former Indian military officer Dev Mahendran and his family find themselves in a perilous situation in a foreign country, Lenarco, during an international conference.
title: Karam

overview: In a village where wedding sabotage is a competitive sport, the members of the Valsala Club bet that they can get a wedding completed within a week to end the tradition
title: Valsala Club

overview: A star kabaddi player's life takes a dangerous turn when he's pulled into the criminal underworld.
title: Balti

overview: A tragic car crash leaves a wealthy couple stranded on a remote road. Seeking shelter in a secluded house, they uncover dark secrets and become entangled in a deadly game of murder, deception, and revenge-where nothing is as it seems.
title: Kalaratri

overview: How would 4 psychos celebrate Onam? How would they make their Sadya special? Have you ever thought about that?
title: Maveli Naduvaneedum Kalam

overview: In a village where Thampachi and Komaras are believed to be the counterparts of God, everyone respects Shiva Thampachi and his daughter Shivani. Unexpectedly, a job offer comes in search of Shivani.
title: Thampachi

overview: Set against the serene yet fragile landscape of Kanjirappally, Hidden Tremors is a deeply personal and emotionally resonant portrait of a community in transition. As frequent landslides and subtle seismic shifts threaten both land and life, a quieter crisis unfolds within a family struggling to hold on — to land, to memory, and to each other. Through evocative performances, the film captures the emotional depth of separation, resilience, and longing.
title: Hidden Tremors

overview: A drunken man's encounter sets off a chain of gossip in a town of secrets. As whispers spread, a woman's hidden past threatens to tear everything apart.
title: Avihitham

overview: Fathima, a housewife in the coastal town of Ponnani, lives under the strict control of her orthodox husband, Ashraf. When her son wets their old mattress, Fathima’s attempt to replace it sparks conflict. Ashraf blocks her at every turn, despite her back pain and growing frustration. Eventually, Fathima realizes the mattress represents more than just comfort it’s her chance to reclaim her independence. By finally buying it, she takes a bold stand
title: Feminist Fathima

overview: A couple of amateur sleuths attempt to solve the mystery behind disappearing pets, but become embroiled in far more sinister crimes.
title: The Pet Detective

overview: At Anakkara Police Station, probationary SI Jancy and constable Hareesh do not get along well. The main reason is Hareesh’s immature attitude towards women. Both of them are also struggling with problems in their family lives. One night, while on patrol together, an unexpected incident turns their lives upside down. The chain of events that follows
title: Paathirathri

overview: Soman, who plays the trumpet in the Cannoli bandset, works at the local lime kiln.He is in love with a girl named Chempakam from the same village Chempakam’s marriage had been fixed with her maternal uncle’s son, Madhavan, who is a policeman. When Madhavan realizes that Chempakam is in love with Soman, he conspires with the mill owner to kill Soman
title: KANOLI BANDSET

overview: Nellikampoil, a village adjacent to Forest, is very common. Many strange events are taking place in this land full of many myths. A figure with the legs of a horse and the body of a man is filling the land with fear by hanging a chicken head in the houses and hiding it in darkness and fear.
title: Nellikkampoyil Night Riders

overview: Two IT professionals, Balu and Ritha, face unforeseen challenges that test their relationship after their recent marriage.
title: Cherukkanum Pennum

overview: A school boy being questioned by his teacher- his first bitter lesson in social discrimination. As he struggles to understand this silent injustice, he begins to see the world through new, questioning eyes.
title: Da'Lit Kids

overview: Rohan's affluent lifestyle spirals out of control as he becomes convinced there is a supernatural entity in his home. As he starts to uncover the mystery, he is drawn into unexpected worlds and alliances, along with the horrors that lie ahead.
title: Diés Iraé

overview: Set in a small, vibrant village, Oru Onnonnara Ottam follows the hilarious journey of three youngsters running a struggling event management business. When their warehouse owner demands overdue rent, they finally find hope in a cousin’s upcoming wedding — but things take a wild turn when the bride suddenly elopes !
title: Oru Onnonnara Ottam

overview: Ravi is a Theyyam artist. While tying Theyyam in a temple, Ravi, under the influence of a feeling kills a bystander, Thangam Satheesan, with a spear in his hand. When he regains consciousness after untying the Theyyam, Ravi is unable to accept the truth that he is a murderer. Even though he repeatedly claims that he did not do it. Since the circums
title: COMONDRA ALIEN

overview: Explores Different Shades Of Human Desire Through Jessie, Ilyas, Samuel, And Bhaskaran - Each Chasing Passion, Longing, Or Curiosity In Their Own Way, Revealing How Desires Shape Life And Lead To Self-Realisation.
title: Madhuram Jeevamruthabindu

overview: What can even go wrong when Mr. G. R Indugopan tries starting his morning productive by finishing his writing assignments, when a self-proclaimed "fan" barges into his workspace, asking unwanted questions !?
title: The Writer's Room

overview: Kerala, with its lush landscapes, has seen many migrate abroad for work, creating local labor shortages filled by distant migrants. These workers endure isolation, discrimination and uncertainty, often overlooked beyond their labour. Yet, amid struggle, they forge bonds, share stories, and discover solace in fleeting joys.
title: See Me, When You Leave

overview: On his way to a long-overdue drinking party with two friends, Anish receives an unexpected call from Anjana, a past lover visiting the city. Their decision to meet sets the stage for an evening of easy banter, reopened wounds, and difficult choices.
title: Ithiri Neram

overview: Vinod, 29, is a man of routine. Living in Karunagappally and working at the Planning Office in Thiruvananthapuram, he spends his days in a carefully controlled cycle of train commutes, meticulous work, and an almost obsessive adherence to order.
title: Innocent

overview: a filmmaker setting out to capture the life of demolition worker, an immigrant whose close friends and fellow workers went missing. As the filmmaker attempts to do so, the production faces many symbolic and frustrating obstacles in between. Disheartened, the filmmaker departs the site—defeated, exhausted, and grieving the story they couldn’t tell.
title: Hypothesis of Barrier Agreed Upon

overview: A bunch of friends on a holiday save a young girl from the hands of a few goons but later find her murdered. Before long, they flee to some place but the murderer scampers after them.
title: Holidays

overview: John Paul is a leading Motivational Speaker who leads peaceful family life with his wife and two children. One day John met a man in his fearful dream. Ironically his son met that same man in real life.The real story begins with that twist.
title: Page

overview: Three young mechanics move their bike repair workshop to an isolated homestay rumoured to be haunted - only to encounter chilling, unexplained events that soon come to life and cannot be ignored.
title: Nidhiyum Bhoothavum

overview: On the edge of a misty hilltop in rural Kerala, a young man named Arjun prepares to end his life. It’s the day of his beloved Anu’s wedding—an unbearable moment for a heart that had loved silently and shattered quietly.
title: Athi Bheekara Kaamukan

overview: Someone explores the quiet spaces between memory, longing and silence. Crafted with restraint and emotional depth, the film reflects on the moments we hold close and the words that remain unspoken.
title: Aaro

overview: "Shades of Life" is an introspective and melancholic anthology that threads together different stories, all set against the backdrop of Indian village life
title: Shades Of life

overview: In the misty hills of Kaattukunnu, an aging woman and her servant boy struggle to survive the ghosts of the past, as the hunt for Kuriachan — a legendary dog breeder and outlaw — blurs the line between myth, memory, and vengeance, revealing that even in absence, he still rules the hills.
title: Eko

overview: In the secluded hills of Marayur, a region steeped in the scent and lore of sandalwood, Vilayath Buddha unfolds as a potent character drama anchored in pride, memory, and resistance.
title: Vilaayath Budha

overview: An unexplored love story before the silence!
title: Hrudhaya

overview: In a college canteen, two students find themselves caught in a quiet confusion that blurs the line between order and reality.
title: Disorder

overview: Victoria, a young beautician in a suburban beauty parlour, decides to elope with her Hindu boyfriend after a fierce clash with her conservative Catholic parents. Amidst the turmoil, a neighbour asks her to temporarily house an offering rooster destined for a festival at St. George church inside the parlour. Juggling the rooster's antics, unexpected clients, and her boyfriend's uncertainty, Victoria grapples with conflicting emotions leading to a day of intense personal and spiritual revelations.
title: Victoria

overview: A chef-in-disguise assassin from Japan and a Kerala cop converge on one colony, each pursuing the same target with their own motives.
title: CHAKRAVYUH

overview: A teacher's life unravels when he falls into debt after mortgaging his house to pay for his daughter's wedding.
title: Madhurakanakku

overview: Lonely and desperate, an elderly matriarch will go to any length to be reunited with her beloved granddaughter.
title: Bhoothayanam

overview: After being released from prison for a murder he did not commit, a man quickly learns that crime and injustice are still rife in his hometown.
title: Pongala

overview: Early 2010s. A routine Kerala Police inquiry in the quiet village of Kottayikonam takes an unexpected turn when a trail of seemingly minor clues unravels into a string of disturbing cases. The investigation soon crosses into Tamil Nadu, revealing unsolved mysteries that have lingered for years.
title: Kalamkaval

overview: Uduppu follows the emotional and turbulent journey of a young woman whose life takes unexpected turns after marriage.
title: Uduppu

overview: Jefin, an NRI hosteller, struggles to adjust to hostel life as he drifts under the weight of influence and possession.
title: Bucket Story

overview: Lord Ayyappa takes human form to stop terrorists targeting a major temple. The National Anti-Terrorist Squad and Indian Army launch a joint operation to counter the planned attack.
title: Sree Ayyappan

overview: In the quiet, parched summer of rural Kerala, the death of Korappan, the aged patriarch of a sprawling joint family, becomes the catalyst for a poignant reckoning. As family members rejoins for the death ceremonies for 16 days, several tension arises between them regarding property, consumption of water from a family well, love relationships and social tensions.
title: Celebration of Death

overview: In a bid to escape the grip of law and punishment, Shanu, a man with secret schemes, ensnares Amala - a woman grappling with psychological struggles. Together on a stolen bike, they embark on a journey where some desires are abandoned, while others reach completion.
title: Desire

overview: OAK is the story of two rival sisters, Sheela (elder) & Neethu. Both are victims of a dysfunctional family and are failure in forming healthy social relationships. Sheela is suffering from borderline personality disorder (BPD). She messes up everything and is insecure about her relationships. Her actions are often self-sabotaging. Neethu is a dopehead and is eccentric in nature. She is rebellious outside but broken inside. The time loop setting in the story serves as a metaphor in OAK.
title: OAK

overview: David has spent days without sleep, craving someone to talk to. One night, a lost traveler arrives at his door. David insists he stay, and their small talk begins. But what starts as a way to calm his anxiety soon grows into something far beyond his control.
title: Await

overview: A elite restaurant divided by a single wall, workers toil in silence like slaves, while elites feast on “the gods’ favourite food.” One woman among the slaves adds a mysterious liquid to the eternal dish 'Ambrosia', triggering chaos among the guests. Emotions erupt, relationships collapse. As the illusion shatters, the enslaved rise and walk out. Ambrosia is a tale of rupture, rebellion, and reclaiming voice in a world built on silence.
title: Ambrosia

overview: Adarsh and Maria, a married couple, appear to share the warmth and freedom of close friends. When Maria's male friend, Sidharth, grows more attached, it has a distinct impact on Adarsh. Subsequently, Adarsh finds himself disturbed and distressed. 'Ebb' delves into the ways love, emotions and their various nuances influence both women and men.
title: Ebb

overview: Arun, a transgender man in his twenties, is trapped in an abusive relationship with his boyfriend, Madhu. Estranged from his family, Arun struggles to navigate a society that refuses to accept him. Fear and isolation keep him from living openly, but his friendship with Padma, a lesbian colleague at the textile shop, becomes a quiet source of strength. As their bond deepens, Padma’s unwavering support helps Arun find the courage to embrace his truth and reclaim his place in the world.
title: Stolen Skies

overview: A young ghostwriter finds his quiet life at a remote estate suddenly disrupted when he encounters a woman who has suffered a terrible ordeal. As they navigate the aftermath together, their shared experience creates an unexpected bond that challenges them both in profound ways. This atmospheric character drama explores how two strangers, brought together by circumstance, discover strength and connection in the face of life's darkest moments.
title: Sheshippu

overview: Deepak and Devika, a seemingly perfect IT couple, celebrate their 4th wedding anniversary with close friends. However, the evening takes an unexpected turn when Deepak's girlfriend arrives, exposing his infidelity. The revelation sparks a heated confrontation, revealing extramarital affairs of Devika and other friends.Yet, as they come to terms with their own hypocrisy, they share a moment of raw honesty.
title: The Banquet Of Primal Love

overview: In a home suffocating under the weight of a shared trauma, Alwin and Priya’s marriage has slipped into a bitter cycle of anger and avoidance. When Priya’s torment suddenly gives way to an eerie change, Alwin’s unease turns to fear; her change feels unnatural, almost inhuman. His search for answers leads him to a secret buried beneath. To understand the stranger his wife has become, Alwin must confront that same void and risk losing himself to it.
title: The Coffin

overview: A writer's old age is marked by loneliness, where only his characters keep him company. His entire living world becomes his relatives. The film explores this journey through three famous short stories: T. Padmanabhan's "Poocchakkuttikalude Veedu" (The House of Kittens) and "Naykkalukalum Manushyarum" (Dogs and Humans), and Rene Basin's French story, "Thapal Pettiyile Kuruvikal" ( Birds in the Postbox).
title: All The Living

overview: Nari Monchan, from a secluded tribe, grapples with dwindling female presence, possessiveness in marriage, and revelations about his father that unravel his beliefs. As he confronts ancestral traditions and the legacy of the Indian Emergency, his journey becomes a search for identity, shaped by personal fears and buried truths. The film explores the fragile balance between tradition, desire, and self-discovery. This is the first film in Cholanaikka language spoken by the eponymous cave people.
title: Life of a Phallus

overview: After the Chief Minister of Kerala is kidnapped, a determined investigator is brought in to track down the mysterious abductor, uncovering hidden motives and secrets behind the crime.
title: Bha. Bha. Ba.

overview: The Movie Starts with a flashback where beautiful visuals of a mother feeding her daughter Shifting to present day there are two youngsters ‘ Sandeep ’ and ‘ Melvin ’ who have a brotherly relationship. Melvin is in love with ‘ Eliza ’ whom he met 2 months back online. He is requesting ‘ Sandeep ’ to accompany him to meet his love forthe first time
title: ELIZA

overview: A devout Muslim girl from a strict family falls for a middle-class Christian boy and the couple's fight against cultural boundaries and her father’s wrath to keep their love alive.
title: Saviyum Suharayum

overview: When a serious incident puts a university and its students at risk, a stoic lecturer devises a plan to protect them.
title: Aghosham

overview: A man who loses his belief in God meets the spirit of a young woman unable to remember what happened to her.
title: Sarvam Maya

overview: The protagonist, Asif, and his friends Vijay and AB are artists who perform rap at weddings and small events in a village called Kadalundi, adjacent to the city of Kozhikode. While performing rap at their friends wedding, Asif sees a beautiful girl there, but he falls in love with her at first sight, but is un able to find out who she is or where
title: Haal

overview: What happens if two sworn enemies from a previous life are reborn as father-son in a new birth?
title: Vrusshabha

overview: A man and woman navigate the highs and lows of a long-distance relationship.
title: Mindiyum Paranjum

overview: Bloody Christmas is a mystery-driven thriller where silence follows violence and secrets refuse to stay buried.
title: Bloody Christmas

overview: A group of friends discover that there is a class difference among them, where some cannot afford the activities others enjoy, when spending time together. They sit around a table that quickly turns into a battleground, where they bluntly argue it out.
title: The Split
